pytils
======
**pytils** is a collection of modules and scripts useful for Python coding
of various kind. It includes for example utilities for doctest, performance
enhancing tips and tricks etc.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   pytils/_readme.rst
   pytils/launchers/scripts.rst
   pytils/launchers/doctests.rst
